sources.name: MoviesS3_2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  MoviesS3_2

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MoviesS3_2 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://sartflohiltraining.dfs.core.windows.net/sample-data/output//MoviesS3.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MoviesS3_2
in
  Source;
